name: The End Is Nigh (itch) (ZED)
description:
Destroy the angels to hasten the end.

Horde Mode shoot 'em up game.

Controls
Move: WASD or Arrows
Shoot: LMB or Space (n.b: will always shoot towards cursor)

Spoiler: The end may be nigh, but the angels will never stop chasing you. This game may or may not be a lie.
